meanings.definition: To put together or gather information from various sources into one cohesive whole.
meanings.sent1: She compiled all her research findings into a detailed report.
meanings.sent2: The librarian compiled a list of recommended books for the students.
meanings.sent3: The detective compiled all the clues to solve the mystery.
meanings.sent4: He compiled his memories into a scrapbook of his travels.
meanings.sent5: The chef compiled a recipe book with all his favorite dishes.

meanings.definition: To create a collection or list by bringing together different items or elements.
meanings.sent1: The teacher compiled a list of supplies needed for the science experiment.
meanings.sent2: She compiled a playlist of her favorite songs for the road trip.
meanings.sent3: The kids compiled a mix of candies for their Halloween treat bags.
meanings.sent4: He compiled a portfolio of his artwork to showcase his talent.
meanings.sent5: The team compiled a list of ideas for the upcoming project.
